Detailed Description

This class helps in formating time and dates.

Member Function Documentation

void DateTimeUtils::format ( std::string &  retFormattedTime,
time_t  time,
bool  fullDateFormat = false 
) [static]

Returns the time in string format.

Parameters:
retFormattedTime Returned formatted date and/or time string.
time Date and time to be formatted.
fullDateFormat True for returning the full date and time, false to return either the time (if the date is from today) or the date.

bool DateTimeUtils::parse ( DateTime &  retDateTime,
const std::string &  formattedTime 
) [static]

Parses a date/time string and returns a DateTime struct.

NOTE: At the moment, only "fullDateFormat" strings, as described in the above "format" method, can be parsed.

Parameters:
retDateTime Returned date and time.
formattedTime Date and time in string format.
